1.title: The Scarecrow Comes Alive!

episode of.title: Halloween Wars: Hayride of Horror (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: The teams compete by creating displays that depict scarecrows taking revenge on farmers.

2.title: When Pumpkins Fight Back

episode of.title: Halloween Wars: Hayride of Horror (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The teams create haunting displays showing what it looks like when pumpkins stage an uprising.

3.title: Possessed Zoo

episode of.title: Halloween Wars: Hayride of Horror (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Two teams of master food artists combine cake, sugar and carved pumpkins to show how to survive a night escaping the demonic inhabitants of a possessed zoo.

imdb.plot outline: Two teams of five contestants including a cake sculptor, a sugar artist, and three pumpkin carvers create Halloween themed displays in the pumpkin patch to impress two judges and a whole hayride of children. The winning team gets $15,000 dollars. Unlike Halloween Wars which it is spun off from there are no eliminations and the same teams compete each episode meaning there is a greater chance to win at least once.
imdb.title: Halloween Wars: Hayride of Horror
